channel.title: It says Error Connecting to server
channel.description:
Do i need to have an account to play? what?
i really want to play but someone help..
Problem: 'Error Connecting to server'

item.title: It says Error Connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @rickyjones rickyjones
item.description:
@rickyjones wrote:

okay try clicking start seva then type a random pass and user then log in it should work if not try going and clicking on help then serva status and type in a serva (its i.p) then a random pass and user

Read full topic
